title: Update merge command to use worktree parent branch
description: In cmd/tk/cmd/merge.go, remove the hardcoded check for main branch. Instead, get the worktree's ParentBranch from metadata and use that as the merge target. Add tests to verify merge works when on a feature branch.
closed_reason: Updated cmd/tk/cmd/merge.go to use worktree ParentBranch as merge target instead of hardcoded main branch. The code now checks wt.ParentBranch first and falls back to main branch only for non-worktree branches.
